patterns: what are the contents of the courses?

My child cannot operate a laptop.How do you help him/her
responses: We teach a lot of things here.Visuals help to create an impact on an individual to understand the courses.A child needs to be explained about what he/she learns in an innovative way. Child needs a good exposure.He/she needs to develop interest in whatever they do.It helps them for the overall development and they can perform all other chores easily.

patterns: Can my child create an app on his own after finishing the course
Can my child build a game on his/her own?
Can my child write a program on his/her own?
responses: Ofcourse,a student can create/build them with great ease after they finish their course.

patterns: How many students in a class?
What is the strength of the class?
How do you divide many students across the same course?
responses: It depends on the number of admissions we get.We make sure that an individual can learn effectively with all the available resources.Keeping in my mind the betterment of students and mentors we will divide the students in an efficient way.

patterns: How much time is allocated for a class?
What is the duration of a class?
How the time is allocated for the courses
responses: It depends on the number of classes alloted.We make sure that an individual can learn effectively with all the available resources in an optimal time.Keeping in my mind the betterment of students and mentors we will divide the time in an efficient way.

patterns: Will you monitor each child individually?
Is there 1-1 interaction in the live classes
How can you treat mt child?
Is it necessary for a parent to sit aside the child during the courses?
responses: We provide 1-1 interaction in the live classes.We do monitor kids individually.We teach in an interactive manner that a child need not be monitored by his/her parent.

When was your company started?
responses: Manish Motghare founded Code Karo Yaaro in the year 2020. Our vision is to make every child literate in computer science and to generate a caliber of coding to enhance life experience. We want to develop the thinking ability of every child, by advancing computer science with new technologies and supporting them in a bright future.
